ti:translation.ti:label: Of common conceptions, against the Stoics.
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. IV. Goodwin, William W., editor; White, Samuel, translator. Boston: Little, Brown, and Company. Cambridge. 1874.

ti:edition.ti:label: Περὶ τῶν κοινῶν ἐννοιῶν πρὸς τοὺς Στωικοὺς
